articles.title: Magellan boss' exit goes unexplained, shares tank - The Australian Financial Review
articles.description: Magellan Financial Group’s market valuation crumbled on Tuesday after the unexplained departure of chief executive Brett Cairns, whose mysterious exit was disclosed to the market after the closing bell on Monday.
